body: Ok so, it is really annoying when i'm playing walls and theres only two teams left but the other team are all crouching! It's very hard to find them. What happen to the compasses? Some people don't even budge too! They will legit stay there till the end of the game!

title: The walls >.<

replies.body:
I noticed some other things on walls like if your a certain height off the ground and then the walls fall you cant build out you can only go up or down if you try to go out like place blocks outwards from where you have already built it says you can not build in the void.

Is this a bug or to prevent skybasing? Also is fire not spreading?

replies.body: ^oh that's for those trollers who always like to burn down that big tree in the village I think. I have no other reason to explain it.

replies.body: I like fire spreading it makes taking down people in skybases and people hiding in trees so much easier to get.
